title: Untitled
text:
UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer has announced a full ban on ninja swords starting August 1 to combat rising knife crime. Offenders face up to two years in prison under the Crime and Policing Bill now in Parliament.

Possession, trade, or manufacturing of the swords will be illegal, with a buyback program running from July 1 to 31. The government set March 27 as the final legal purchase date.

Home Secretary Yvette Cooper said: “We are acting with urgency to bring forward measures to prevent deadly weapons from getting into the wrong hands.”
